title: Raw2Event: Converting Raw Frame Camera into Event Camera
summary: This work presents Raw2Event, a hardware-software system for real-time event generation from low-cost raw frame cameras, leveraging event cameras' advantages like high temporal resolution and dynamic range for vision tasks.
usefulness_reason: The title and summary clearly indicate processing of temporal events from raw frames, which is a spatio-temporal process. The mention of 'high temporal resolution' further supports this.
